mapper.insert: insert into stay (stayNum,stayName,stayImage,stayPhone, stayLocation,stayAdultPrice,stayKidPrice,stayGrade,stayTitle,stayContent, staySite,stayType,entNum,stayImageClone) values ( stay_seq.nextval, #{stayName},#{stayImage},#{stayPhone} ,#{stayLocation},#{stayAdultPrice},#{stayKidPrice},#{stayGrade}, #{stayTitle},#{stayContent}, #{staySite},#{stayType},#{entNum},#{stayImageClone})
mapper.select: select stayNum,stayName,stayImage,stayPhone, stayLocation,stayAdultPrice,stayKidPrice,stayTitle,stayGrade,stayContent, to_char(stayWriteDay,'YYYY/MM/dd') stayWriteDay,stayReadCnt, stayRepleCnt,staySite,stayGoods,stayType,entNum,stayImageClone from stay where stayNum = #{stayNum}
mapper.update: update stay set stayReadCnt = stayReadCnt + 1 where stayNum = #{stayNum}
update stay set stayGoods = stayGoods + 1 where stayNum = #{stayNum}
